text: Marvelise () is a commune in the Doubs département in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in eastern France. ==Geography== Marvelise is from the Swiss border in the Jura mountains. On the east are the Hauts des Roches (502 m) and on the west the Chanois (516 m). ==Population== ==Related pages== * Communes of the Doubs department ==References== ==Other websites== * Marvelise on the intercommunal Web site of the department Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Marvelise
